overview: Professor Alice Roberts follows a year of British archaeology, joining up the results of digs and investigations the length of the country. Chapter 1. The Early Settlers The arrival of the earliest humans to mysterious ceremonies at Stonehenge. Chapter 2. A Land of Tribes An incredible chariot burial in Yorkshire to a vast coin hoard on Jersey. Chapter 3. Roman Conquest The foundation of Londinium in the south to fierce siege battles in the north. Chapter 4. Anglo-Saxon Kingdoms Evidence of a warrior culture and the enormous wealth of their aristocracy.
title: Digging for Britain Greatest Discoveries
